[A-Za-z0-9]+.description: The array containing possible values for attributes of type 'OrderedList'.
[A-Za-z0-9]+.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array containing the possible values of an attribute of type 'OrderedList'.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DellBootSources.description: BootSources contains properties surrounding a BIOS BootSources Registry (where the system-specific BIOS BootSources are described) and the Actions needed to perform changes to BIOS BootSources settings, which typically require a system reset to apply.
DellBootSources.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent BIOS BootSources attributes for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AttributeRegistry.description: The Resource ID of the BootSources Registry for the BIOS BootSources resource.
AttributeRegistry.longDescription: The reference to the BootSources Registry that lists the metadata describing the BIOS BootSources settings in this resource.

Attributes.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific list of BIOS attributes.
Attributes.longDescription: BIOS BootSources settings appear as additional properties in this object, and can be looked up in the BootSources Registry by their AttributeName.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Enabled.description: The attribute that is used set if the boot device is Enabled.
Enabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used to indicate if the boot device is Enabled.

Id.description: The device ID fo the boot device.
Id.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the device ID for the boot device.

Index.description: The index number of the boot device in the boot order list.
Index.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the index number of the boot device in the boot order list.

Name.description: The fully qualified device descriptor (FQDD) of the boot device.
Name.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the fully qualified device descriptor (FQDD) of the boot device.

title: #DellBootSources.v1_0_0.DellBootSources
